prompt: I fixed a bug where the payment API was returning a 500 error on large file uploads (over 10MB). The fix is in api/payment.py where I added proper chunked upload handling. Please make a PR for this.
assertions: The PR title starts with 'fix' type since this is a bug fix
The PR title follows the pattern type(scope): Summary
The PR title summary starts with a capital letter
The response includes a 'gh pr create' command with --title flag
The PR body includes a Summary section describing the fix
The PR body includes a Checklist with PR title format check
